title: NA offers Fateha for Ministerâ€™s brother, victims of Balochistan attack
content:
ISLAMABAD, Sep 05 (APP):The National Assembly offered Fateha on Friday for the brother of the State Minister for National Food Security and Research, Malik Rasheed Ahmed Khan.
The House also offered fateha for the 15 people who lost their lives in the recent attack on a Balochistan National Party (BNP) rally in Balochistan.
Maulana Abdul Ghafoor Haideri led the Fateha.
